content: lion brand pattern # 70724ad skill level intermediate level 3 homespun® article #790 a 2 balls b 1 ball *shown in dusty blue & regency* crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm split ring stitch markers special stitches fpsc front post single_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet bpdc back post double_crochet decrease single_crochet decrease ends of the rectangle are folded up to create the pockets collar is worked between pocket tops in alternating fpdc and bpdc rib the length of the shawlette can be easily adjusted very similar to 80827ad perfect pocketed shawl 1 directions in this version 70724ad pocketed shawlette are more detailed and include fpsc front post single_crochet see pocket shawl super bulky 2 for the homespun® thick & quick® article #792 version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/perfect-pocketed-shawl 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pocket-shawl-super-bulky
